entry.em: ..TORNADO WATCH 432 IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
entry.data: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT /NOON EDT/ THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT /8 PM EDT/ THIS EVENING

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES THIS MORNING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
